text: Viktor Masing (11 April 1925, Tartu – 18 March 2001) was an Estonian botanist and ecologist. He was born in Tartu. He became a member of the Estonian Academy of Sciences in 1993. He was a specialist in telmatology, and an organizer of wetland protection. His son, Matti Masing, is a renowned nature scientist, and one of Europe's foremost experts on bats. ==External links== *Biography Category:Estonian botanists Category:Estonian ecologists Category:1925 births Category:2001 deaths Category:People from Tartu Category:University of Tartu faculty Category:Members of the Estonian Academy of Sciences Category:Recipients of the Order of the National Coat of Arms, 3rd Class Category:Burials at Raadi cemetery
title: Viktor Masing
